mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stained glass window by Powell and Sons: left, Virgin Mary, right, Mary Magdalene

Georgian mansion constructed 1830s. Property purchased by British fertilizer magnate William Gibbs 1843; remodeled beginning 1863 in Gothic Revival style by John Norton. Chapel designed by Arthur Blomfield, 1873-1875. [work]
